room_title: Escape room "Metro Mayhem" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
review: Friendly staff and just the right amount of challenging puzzles. Metro Mayhem room was fun for the whole family!

room_title: Escape room "Metro Mayhem" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
review: Different types of clues and ways to solve the mystery. We did the Mad Scientist room and it turned out to be multiple rooms. It had unique puzzles to solve and interact with. Very enjoyable and I highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Metro Mayhem" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
review: Did an escape room at Masterpiece Escapes with friends. We managed to solve it and save the city from Dr. Devastation.

room_title: Escape room "Metro Mayhem" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
review: My family and I had a wonderful experience defeating Dr Devistation. The puzzles are very creative and the atmosphere is very exciting.

room_title: Escape room "Metro Mayhem" by Masterpiece Escapes in Charlotte
review: I brought some of my employees here to take on Doctor Devastation and his shenanigans. WHAT A BLAST! Thanks for a good time, looking forward to more rooms!
